answers.author: Gregory Stopka
answers.text:
Hi Jody,
Here is the 3/28 Alliance webinar you are looking for:  http://ondemand.transformgov.org/store/seminar/seminar.php?seminar=18999.  
Greg Stopka
Central Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
gstopka@transformgov.org

answers.author: Cory Fleming
answers.text:
Jody - If you have any questions after watching the webinar, I can be reached at cfleming@icma.org or 207-854-1083.

answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hi Jody, 
Here is the webinar that you are looking for, you should be able to log in and then download and review it. 
http://icma.org/en/icma/events/CalendarEvent/100842/FREE__Building_Customer_Service_into_Local_Government
In addition to that webinar you can check out all of the other on demand webinars on this site. 
http://learning.icma.org/store/provider/provider09.php?
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Jody Hellmer
text:
I am looking for a webinar that was held on 3/28/2013 called Customer Service in Local Government. How can I gain access to this webinar? 
thanks!
title: Past Webinar
